titles: An epitome of the title that the Kynges Maiestie of Englande, hath to the souereigntie of Scotlande continued vpon the auncient writers of both nacions, from the beginnyng.
author: Bodrugan, Nicholas.
date: M.D.XLVIII. [1548] Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
publisher: In aedibus Richardi Graftoni, typographi regii],
notes: Printer's name and address from colophon.
Running title reads: The Kynges title to Scotlande.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Kings and rulers --  Early works to 1800.
